channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I was afraid for my life’: the transgender refugees fleeing Trump’s America
item.description: Fear, abuse and eroding rights for trans people have created a hostile environment in the US – can they claim asylum in the Netherlands? The transgend...

item.title: EU has ‘tools at its disposal’ to deal with Trump’s Greenland tariff threats – Europe live
item.description: Olaf Gill says bloc will act to protect its economic interests but ‘priority is to engage, not escalate’ In a nod to Trump’s efforts on Ukraine, Starm...

item.title: Spain train crash: rescue efforts continue as death toll rises in Córdoba crash – latest updates
item.description: At least 39 people killed after high-speed train comes off rails and slams into another service King Felipe of Spain has expressed his “concern about ...

item.title: Starmer calls for ‘calm discussion’ on Greenland and plays down chance of retaliatory tariffs on US – UK politics live
item.description: PM speaks to reporters amid crisis over the territory and Trump’s tariff threats to those who oppose him But , Starmer says, the future of Greenland i...

item.title: First Thing: ‘I no longer feel an obligation to think purely of peace,’ says Trump amid Greenland threats
item.description: Donald Trump links Greenland seizure threats to Nobel snub in letter to Norway’s prime minister. Plus, unseen home video of Martin Luther King Jr. Goo...

item.title: Gold and silver prices hit high after tariff threat
item.description: Donald Trump's plan to impose import taxes over Greenland pushed investors toward precious metals.

item.title: 'Shameful' and 'terrible look' - the chaos that marred Senegal's Afcon triumph
item.description: Senegal beat Morocco to win the Africa Cup of Nations after the final is overshadowed when they temporarily refuse to play.

item.title: What we know about Spain's worst rail disaster in more than a decade
item.description: At least 39 people have died in what local officials are calling Spain's worst rail crash in more than a decade.

item.title: Hospital was warned for years about deadly water infections, says father of cancer patient
item.description: John Cuddihy told BBC Scotland News his late daughter's experiences "must continue to echo beyond her lifetime".

item.title: 'We are not top-five contenders' - is January make or break for Villa?
item.description: After manager Unai Emery says Aston Villa are not top-five contenders in the Premier League, BBC Sport looks at the importance of the transfer window.
